attributes.action: Put an end to the appalling behaviour by so many MPs during PMQs.
attributes.additional_details:
The UK parliament has proudly set the patterns for many democracies throughout the world, but the regular confrontational behaviour and crude insults arising during the course of PMQs provide an awful, damaging image of this once proud institution – which has become a laughing stock to many throughout the world.     
NOTE: The people who have signed this petition are supporters and/or members of ALL parties (and none).
attributes.background:
We have become sick and tired of witnessing the continuing abject, moronic behaviour by so many of our elected politicians during the weekly PMQ debacle.
This is not our idea of democracy and we have had enough.
"NOT IN OUR NAME".
